name: LightWaveEmployeeServer
0: ”Alexa, ask Employee Server to get employees”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: employee server
des:
This skill demonstrates how to integrate an Alexa Skill with an HPE NonStop Server application using LightWave Server from NuWave Technologies. The code for this skill is available on our Gihub site at https://github.com/nuwavetech/lws-employee-crud.

For more information about LightWave Server, see https://www.nuwavetech.com/lightwave-server

v2.0
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
